title: Best of The Program | 7/9/21
description:
Disgraced lawyer Michael Avenatti is in the news again, and Stu and Pat go through the history of his rise to fame and fall from grace. Tokyo is taking no chances with the Olympics and COVID. Jeffy joins Stu and Pat as they discuss Stormy Daniels and COVID news. Stu and Pat go through the timeline of Haiti and the current turmoil the country is experiencing now as more information has been released. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
